entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
